veldspar_collection.name: Veldspar Collection
veldspar_collection.description: Our refinery needs a fresh supply of Veldspar to keep production running. Head to the belts and mine what we need.
veldspar_collection.briefing: Pilot, we're running low on Veldspar stocks. Head out to the nearest asteroid belt and bring back 1000 units. Simple work, but essential for our operations.

scordite_run.name: Scordite Mining Run
scordite_run.description: We need Scordite for our mineral processing operations. Mine the required amount and return.
scordite_run.briefing: Scordite is a valuable ore containing both Tritanium and Pyerite. We need 800 units delivered to this station. Get to the belts and start mining.

pyroxeres_extraction.name: Pyroxeres Extraction
pyroxeres_extraction.description: Our manufacturing division requires Pyroxeres for advanced production. Extract the ore from designated asteroid fields.
pyroxeres_extraction.briefing: Pyroxeres contains Nocxium, a mineral we desperately need for tech II component production. Mine 1500 units from the asteroid belts and return to station.

plagioclase_harvest.name: Plagioclase Harvest
plagioclase_harvest.description: A large order for Plagioclase has come in. We need experienced miners to fill it.
plagioclase_harvest.briefing: One of our corporate clients needs a bulk delivery of Plagioclase. Mine 2000 units and bring them back to this station. A mining barge is recommended for this volume.

kernite_survey.name: Kernite Survey
kernite_survey.description: We've located Kernite deposits in nearby belts. Survey the area and extract the ore.
kernite_survey.briefing: Kernite is a mid-grade ore rich in Mexallon and Isogen. We need 1200 units mined and delivered. Survey the asteroid belts to find the richest deposits.

jaspet_deep_mining.name: Jaspet Deep Mining Operation
jaspet_deep_mining.description: Jaspet deposits have been found in lowsec space. Extract the ore, but be prepared for hostile encounters.
jaspet_deep_mining.briefing: We've identified rich Jaspet deposits in a lowsec system. The ore is extremely valuable, but the area is dangerous. Mine 2500 units and return safely. Watch your directional scanner at all times.

hemorphite_expedition.name: Hemorphite Expedition
hemorphite_expedition.description: An expedition to mine Hemorphite from deep asteroid fields. This ore is critical for advanced manufacturing.
hemorphite_expedition.briefing: Hemorphite is a rare ore that yields Nocxium and Isogen in large quantities. We're sending you on an expedition to mine 3000 units. The asteroid fields are deep in contested space.

hedbergite_recovery.name: Hedbergite Recovery Mission
hedbergite_recovery.description: Recover Hedbergite from an asteroid field that has attracted pirate attention. Expect NPC defense spawns.
hedbergite_recovery.briefing: We have a Hedbergite-rich asteroid field that pirates have been using as a staging area. Mine 2000 units of Hedbergite while defending yourself from NPC spawns. Bring combat drones or an escort.

arkonor_extraction.name: Arkonor Deep Extraction
arkonor_extraction.description: Extract Arkonor from a nullsec asteroid field. Enemy NPC waves will attempt to disrupt your operation.
arkonor_extraction.briefing: Arkonor is one of the most valuable ores in New Eden, found only in nullsec space. We need 5000 units extracted from a field deep in hostile territory. Expect multiple waves of NPC enemies attempting to drive you off. A well-fitted Exhumer with combat support is essential.

mercoxit_critical.name: Critical Mercoxit Acquisition
mercoxit_critical.description: Mine Mercoxit using specialized mining crystals. This rare ore is essential for Tech II production and requires expert mining skills.
mercoxit_critical.briefing: Mercoxit is the rarest and most dangerous ore to mine. It requires specialized deep core mining equipment and Mercoxit mining crystals. We need 2000 units for a critical Tech II manufacturing contract. The fields are in nullsec and heavily contested. This is the most challenging mining operation we offer.
